lines.text: If you lay a hand on me again, I'll be mailing it back to you.
Tell me, is that fella Dermot O'Brien still conning tourists into marrying complete strangers?
I take it you've never had need of his services?
Feck off! Me and Eileen, childhood sweethearts. Ah God, I miss her sometimes. That's her there.
[indicates a picture hanging on the wall]
Oh, pretty. I'm sorry, when did she pass away?
Huh? Oh Jesus, she's not dead! She's away on her holidays!
Oh God, I'm sorry! I misunderstood...

[laughs hysterically]
God, that's priceless! Oh geez, I must remember that! Ha ha! Well, will you have some coffee? You will, you will, you will, you will...
Wow, he must really like that dog...
It's like gum in your hair. It comes out eventually.
Sometimes the easy way out is the right way out.
Is being an idiot like being high all the time?
No, it's like being constantly right.
Oh yes, I'm so very Mary Tyler Moore, everyone says so.
I... I... I long to fax someone
I have a fax.

[gasps]
You do!
It's so beautiful here. If it just had the New York Times, it would be perfect.
You should come to the dance, Marcy, come and have a bit o' craic.
Crack?
Yah, it's brilliant craic.
By crack I'm assuming that you don't mean incredibly hard drugs.
Oh no! It just means havin' a laugh, like havin' a bit o' fun!
There's a time in every relationship when you'll both bend over to pick something up and hit your heads together. Best to get it out of the way.
Okay. Plan 2.
You mean Plan B?
Plan B, 2, what's the difference?
What's Plan B-2?
I always thought you were just really good at your job. But you really are an asshole, aren't you?
They go hand in hand, Senator.
I'll tell you me favorite color; bollix!

[gasps]
You little slut.
I'm sorry?
I said good morning.
Is this a humiliate-the-tourist scenario?

[nodding]
No.
Yes, hello? I'd like to call the United States from the SMALLEST FUCKING ROOM IN THE WORLD!
The management reserves the right to refuse admission to old farts!
Things rarely go according to one's youthful, heroic master plans.
What do you think, tending bar in a tasteless shirt is a more profound and valid way to spend your time?
Yes, I do think that tending bar in a tasteless shirt is a more profound and valid use of my time, yes I do, that's why I do it.

[as reporters surround his limo]
Yes, yes, I hate you all. When I'm President I'll have you all killed.
He's crazy! He threw a rock at me!
What do you mean he threw a rock at you? He threw a rock at both of us.
Well say something in Irish to him. Maybe he'll like you better.
Go back to your wife!
My EX-wife. We're going through with the divorce.
They don't have divorce in Ireland.
They do. It just got in.
Hey Paddy! Paddy! Guess what! I'm gonna stay here and fuck these two guys.

[to his friend]
And you wanted to go see a film.
You could never live here.
What makes you say that?
You're a big city kind o' girl. You're-you're Mary Tyler Moore.
Oh, yes. I am so very Mary Tyler Moore. Everyone says so.
No, but you're- It's like you need to be hooked up to the city otherwise your batteries go flat.
Okay. So, I'm like a battery operated Mary Tyler Moore? If you flatter me any more I'm gonna have to toss your pale, Irish ass off the side of this boat.
